Token.Abstract: The RKObjectParameterization class provides an interface for mapping a local domain object into an NSDictionary representation suitable for use as the parameters of an HTTP request.

Returns a dictionary representation of the given object by performing object mapping using the mapping from the given request descriptor. If the request descriptor specifies a root key path, the mapped parameters will be nested within the dictionary under the specified root key path.

Parameter.Name: requestDescriptor
Parameter.Abstract: The request descriptor describing how the object is to be mapped into an NSDictionary of parameters.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: If there is a problem mapping the parameters, upon return contains a pointer to an instance of NSError that describes the problem.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new dictionary containing the mapped parameters or nil if an error has occurred.
